item.title: Mental State Exam
item.description: Appearance Observe the patient’s general appearance: Personal hygiene: are there any signs of self-neglect? Clothing: are they dressed appropriately for the weather/circumstances?

item.title: Obesity
item.description: A BMI >$30 kg/m^3$ Obesity is a chronic condition characterized by the accumulation of excess body fat, leading to adverse health effects.
